name: Snowbox (Splinter)
description:
Snowbox is a snow themed physics sandbox game made with Flowlab. There are currently 11 blocks with more on the way on 12/25/21.

Controls (in-game as well):

IJKL: Move cursor

A: Place Block

Number Keys: Switch Block

Q: Place Special Block (special blocks can be changed in the shop when it comes out on 12/25/21)

Right Click: Delete Block

Left Click: Rotate Block (only works on snow wedges at the moment)

O: Relocate Cursor

Arrow Keys: Move Player Snowballs (white snowballs)

U: Change Cursor Color (for fun)
